Odoo Mobile Point of Sale With CRM

Experience seamless mobile point of sale (POS) management with the Odoo Mobile Point of Sale Backend app. Our powerful backend solution enhances your mobile POS experience by providing a comprehensive suite of features for effortless payment processing and streamlined customer relationship management (CRM).

Key Features:

  • User-Friendly Interface
  • Responsive UI: A user interface that adapts to different screen sizes and orientations for a better user experience.
  • Search Functionality: Robust search capabilities to quickly find products and customers.
  • Payment Processing (Needs integration with country regulations)
  • Customer Relationship Management (CRM)
  • Integration and Customization:
    • Integration with other systems: Integrating with third-party applications such as accounting software, e-commerce platforms, and marketing tools.
    • Customization options: Allowing businesses to customize the system to fit their specific needs, such as adding custom fields, workflows, and reports.
